dms-upload.title: Document Upload
dms-upload.content: Upload and organize legal documents with version control and secure sharing.

button-rich-text-template.title: Rich Text Template Builder
button-rich-text-template.content: Create visually designed templates with tables, formatting, and variable insertion. Perfect for complex documents with specific layouts.

button-template-builder.title: Field-Based Template Builder
button-template-builder.content: Build templates using structured fields from client, case, and court data. Ideal for forms with standard field layouts.

button-create-template.title: JSON Editor
button-create-template.content: Create or edit templates using raw JSON. For advanced users who need complete control over template structure.
